title: kanavu palittadammA
sahitya:
kanavu palittadammA vIrak-kavi yOgigaL kaNDa sama yOga sAdhanak-


anupallavi

  anavaratamum ulaguidiDat-tavam sheida Ananda munivarin jnAnattilE ezhunda


caraNam    innalaDiyai iruLODip-pOnadE indiyA indiyar sonds vIDAnadE
Annaiyin aghattilE punnakai pUttadE alikkum Anmai vandE arattinaik-kAttadE
